Description: Limestone ostracon bearing on one side a low relief representation of Ramses II and cartouches: a trial-piece. On the reverse is a depiction of the goddess Qadesh.
Curator's comments: There is some question as to the authenticity of the scene showing Ramesses II (NCS, 20/12/00).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393581) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393581)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2016 - 2017, Dec - Jun, Karlsruhe, Badisches Landesmuseum, Ramesses
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Ramses II
